item.title: Rich Brian - Dat Stick
item.description:
12
in the morning
Pop shells
for a living
And
berry gon’ smell
Blood trail
every minute
Rogue wave
on you xiggas
No fail when I hit ’em
every time I see a pig
I don’t hesitate
to kill ’em
Ain’t nobody give
a xuck about a rule
Either get diplomas
or a tool I’ma cool
With my youngins
no bool
When I’m sprayin’
this K at you xuckas
Xuck a gang
affiliated
With nothing
but my name
Man
I don’t give a xuck
About
a mothaxuckin’ po
I’ma pull up
with that
Stick and hit yo
motherxuckin’ door
Man
I don’t give a xuck
About
a mothaxuckin’ po
I’ma pull up
with that
Stick and hit yo
motherxuckin’ door
People
be starving
And people
be killing for food
With that crack
and that spoon
But these rich
mothaxuckas
They stay
eatin’ good
Droppin’ wage
livin’ good
Holdin’ steel glocks
but you been a xitch
Xuck a thick cock
xuck a crip walk
Hit the strip
like in Bangkok
Never ever see me ever
trip ‘bout a lil broad
See me
on the TV screamin’
Xitch
you a xamn fraud
And you don’t wanna
xuck
With a chigga
like me
When I pull up
in that Maserati
Better duck
fore ya brain
Splatter
on the concrete
I’ma hit you
with that 45
Bullet hit yo neck
‘round the bow tie
Lookin’
like a thriller
Film xitch
I’ma go right back
With the clip in
I know you be shakin’
Don’t
test me
Or I might just click
at yo noggin’
Man
I don’t give a xuck
About
a mothaxuckin’ po
I’ma pull up
with that
Stick and hit yo
motherxuckin’ door
Man
I don’t give a xuck
About
a mothaxuckin’ po
I’ma pull up with that
stick and hit yo
Motherxuckin’ door
yeah
